items.title: WhatsApp’s biggest market is becoming its toughest test

items.title: Mesa shuts down credit card that rewarded cardholders for paying their mortgages
items.description: Fintech startup Mesa has shut down its Homeowners Card, which awarded points to cardholders for paying their mortgages.
